sig_info: Magneto’s mutation reaches Omega level, preventing him from losing more than 448.4 to 159.94 Health from any single damage source, excluding damage from a Special 3 Attack.

He also gains +84.21 to 130.24 Critical Resistance and Block Penetration.
This attribute bonus is increased by +100%.
Heavy Attacks now deal a burst of 15.8 to 78.96 Energy Damage.

MAGNETISM - FIGHTING #METAL CHAMPIONS: #Metal opponents suffer an indefinite Magnetized Passive which is applied 1 second(s) after the start of the fight and does the following:
MUTATION - ALWAYS ACTIVE: Magneto’s attacks deal Energy damage instead of Physical. Additionally, he gains +10% base Special Attack damage.
Incoming Bleed & Shock Debuffs suffer -90% Potency.
+50% Perfect Block Chance.
+23.7 Attack rating.
Attacks cannot be Auto-Blocked or Miss.
IGNORE CLASS DISADVANTAGE: During fights where Magneto has a Class Disadvantage, he removes his Attack Penalty and his opponent loses their Attack Bonus.
KNOCK THE OPPONENT DOWN: 100% chance to gain an indefinite Prowess Buff, which is removed after Magneto’s next Special Attack and grants +20% Special Attack damage. Max Stacks: 5. No Max Stack limit.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Magneto’s force field grants him an Unstoppable Buff during the attack. If struck during a Heavy Attack, this effect goes on cooldown for 14 seconds. Cooldown shortened by 10 seconds.
If held for 0.7 seconds, 100% chance per Prowess Buff to gain another Prowess Buff lasting 10 seconds and granting +5% Special Attack damage. Max Stacks: 30.
ENHANCED BLEED DEBUFFS: Personal Bleed Debuffs are upgraded into Shrapnel Bleeds which inflict 55.3 Physical damage when they end.
If the opponent is Immune to a Bleed Debuff, inflict an Armor Break Debuff, reducing Armor Rating by 400 for 12 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 59.25 Direct Damage over 6 seconds.
If the opponent has an Armor Break Debuff, inflict an additional Bleed.
Inflict an additional Bleed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, reducing Armor Rating by 1066.67 for 10 seconds. This Armor Break does not stack but is Re-applied each time Magneto gains a Prowess effect.
This Debuff triggers when the Special Attack is launched.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: If the opponent is a #Hero Champion, 100% chance to gain a 30 second Fury Buff, granting +59.25 Attack.
100% chance to gain a 30 second Fury Buff, granting +59.25 Attack.
Each Prowess Buff on Magneto has a 70% chance to inflict 1 Bleed Debuff, causing 43.45 direct damage over 8 seconds.

sig_info: Magneto’s mutation reaches Omega level, preventing him from losing more than 592.4 to 211.3 Health from any single damage source, excluding damage from a Special 3 Attack.

He also gains +86.84 to 134.31 Critical Resistance and Block Penetration.
This attribute bonus is increased by +100%.
Heavy Attacks now deal a burst of 20.8 to 103.95 Energy Damage.

MAGNETISM - FIGHTING #METAL CHAMPIONS: #Metal opponents suffer an indefinite Magnetized Passive which is applied 1 second(s) after the start of the fight and does the following:
MUTATION - ALWAYS ACTIVE: Magneto’s attacks deal Energy damage instead of Physical. Additionally, he gains +10% base Special Attack damage.
Incoming Bleed & Shock Debuffs suffer -90% Potency.
+50% Perfect Block Chance.
+31.2 Attack rating.
Attacks cannot be Auto-Blocked or Miss.
IGNORE CLASS DISADVANTAGE: During fights where Magneto has a Class Disadvantage, he removes his Attack Penalty and his opponent loses their Attack Bonus.
KNOCK THE OPPONENT DOWN: 100% chance to gain an indefinite Prowess Buff, which is removed after Magneto’s next Special Attack and grants +20% Special Attack damage. Max Stacks: 5. No Max Stack limit.
WHEN CHARGING A HEAVY ATTACK: Magneto’s force field grants him an Unstoppable Buff during the attack. If struck during a Heavy Attack, this effect goes on cooldown for 14 seconds. Cooldown shortened by 10 seconds.
If held for 0.7 seconds, 100% chance per Prowess Buff to gain another Prowess Buff lasting 10 seconds and granting +5% Special Attack damage. Max Stacks: 30.
ENHANCED BLEED DEBUFFS: Personal Bleed Debuffs are upgraded into Shrapnel Bleeds which inflict 72.8 Physical damage when they end.
If the opponent is Immune to a Bleed Debuff, inflict an Armor Break Debuff, reducing Armor Rating by 412.5 for 12 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 78 Direct Damage over 6 seconds.
If the opponent has an Armor Break Debuff, inflict an additional Bleed.
Inflict an additional Bleed.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict an Armor Break Debuff, reducing Armor Rating by 1100 for 10 seconds. This Armor Break does not stack but is Re-applied each time Magneto gains a Prowess effect.
This Debuff triggers when the Special Attack is launched.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: If the opponent is a #Hero Champion, 100% chance to gain a 30 second Fury Buff, granting +78 Attack.
100% chance to gain a 30 second Fury Buff, granting +78 Attack.
Each Prowess Buff on Magneto has a 70% chance to inflict 1 Bleed Debuff, causing 57.2 direct damage over 8 seconds.

If the opponent is Immune to a Bleed Debuff, inflict an Armor Break Debuff, reducing Armor Rating by 500 for 12 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 819 Direct Damage over 6 seconds.
If the opponent has an Armor Break Debuff, inflict an additional Bleed.
Inflict an additional Bleed.
